entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets or snow changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
